Key Match Events: Elie Eldhino scored the first goal of the match in the 37th minute
Michel Musore scored in the 47th minute
Claude Girumugisha scored in the 69th minute
Sarr scored a penalty in the 71st minute
Pre-Game Insights: Senegal were far from their best against Burkina Faso and were made to pay for their complacency.
Burundi just about did enough to fend off the challenge of Malawi and come away with maximum points from a thrilling five-goal encounter in Thursday's clash between the teams.
Senegal will fancy their chances of continuing their perfect record in this fixture having won both of the previous two meetings by a combined score of 5-1.
Burundi will be looking to use their momentum to take yet another step in the right direction towards booking their ticket to Morocco.
Post-Match Reflections: Senegal were keen to sign off on September's round of qualifying matches with all three points.
Burundi will be looking to use their momentum to take yet another step in the right direction towards booking their ticket to Morocco.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Burundi Africa Cup of Nations Qualifying form: W
Burundi form (all competitions): L, L, D, D, W, W
Senegal Africa Cup of Nations Qualifying form: D
Senegal form (all competitions): L, W, W, D, W, D
